name: Thing
keywords: Thing, Iot, light, temeprature, humidity, sensors, Wireless, RF, nrf24l01, adc1115, gateway, Arduino, ESP8266, ESP32
description: About Iot sensor network to capture and send data on environmental variables (temperature (Air and Earth), humidity (Air and Earth), light, thermal sensation) to the cloud through a Gateway, communicating through RF24Network. Arduino, ESP8266 & ESP32 compatible.
